subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kovalchuk, who is in the first year of a 15-year, $100 million deal with the Devils, said it was MacLean’s decision for him to miss the Devils’ 6-1 home loss Saturday against the Buffalo Sabres.
snippet: Kovalchuk, who is in the first year of a 15-year, $100 million deal with the Devils, said it was MacLean’s decision for him to miss the Devils’ 6-1 home loss Saturday against the Buffalo Sabres.
